Package free.util

Contains various, small, rather unrelated utilities.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PaintHook An interface suitable for classes which want to allow extending their (complex) painting behaviour.
 

Class Summary
AppKiller A WindowListener which calls System.exit(0) when a WINDOW_CLOSING event occurs on a window it is a listener of.
ApplyLicense A commandline utility application which adds text taken from a given file, and adds it to the beginning of all files with the given extension in a given directory.
ArrayEnumeration An implementation of the Enumeration interface which enumerates the items of an array.
AWTUtilities A collection of AWT related utilities.
BeanProperties This class provides the functionality of storing and retrieving bean properties while automatically notifying any listeners.
BlockingQueue A blocking queue, one that always "contains" elements.
Bounce Implements a TCP/IP bounce utility (proxy).
BrowserControl A simple, static class to display a URL in the system browser.
Connection This is the base class for all classes that define a connection to some server.
EventListenerList A convenient storage place for Listeners.
ExtensionFilenameFilter An implementation of the java.io.FilenameFilter which accepts files whose name ends with a certain string.
GraphicsUtilities Provides graphics related utilities.
ImageUtilities Various image related utilities.
ImageUtilities.ImageLoadObserver This class is an implementation of ImageObserver which notifies a given lock when loading of the Image is done.
IOUtilities Various utility methods that have something to do with I/O.
MemoryFile An implementation of a virtual file, whose contents are kept in memory.
MultiOutputStream An OutputStream which relays all data written into it into a list of given OutputStreams.
Pair A wrapper for any two other given objects.
PipedStreams This class is responsible for creating and managing pairs of PipedStreams.
PumpThread A thread which pumps information read from a given input stream into the given output stream.
RawTelnet Implements a raw connection to a server.
SafeRunnable A runnable which catches and prints all Throwables except ThreadDeath thrown within its run method.
SingleItemEnumeration An implementation of the Enumeration interface which enumerates a single item.
SquareLayout A LayoutManager which lays out a single component making sure its height is always the same as its width.
StringEncoder A utility class which encodes certain common types into Strings.
StringParser A utility class which parses certain common types from Strings.
Struct This is a convenient superclass for classes whose job is to be containers of (constant) data.
TableLayout A LayoutManager which lays out the components in a table-like structure.
TextUtilities A utility class which provides many useful text manipulation methods.
Utilities A collection of general utility methods.
WindowDisposingListener An ActionListener and a WindowListener which disposes of the given Window when one of actionPerformed or windowClosing methods are called.
 

Exception Summary
FormatException Thrown when the format of something is wrong.
UnsupportedOperationException This is a replacement for the 1.2 class java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException.
 

Package free.util Description

Contains various, small, rather unrelated utilities.
